ExtendedDescription.name: ExtendedDescription
ExtendedDescription.description: Represents an extended description for the instance, to be shown on its about page.
ExtendedDescription.exampleJson:
{ "updated_at":"2022-11-03T04:09:07Z", "content":"

For inquiries not related specifically to the operation of this server, such as press inquiries, please contact press@joinmastodon.org.

Funding

This server is crowdfunded by Patreon donations. For a list of sponsors, see joinmastodon.org.

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We usually handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

Impressum

Mastodon gGmbH
MÃ¼hlenstraÃŸe 8a
14167 Berlin
Germany

E-Mail-Adresse: hello@joinmastodon.org

Vertretungsberechtigt: Eugen Rochko (GeschÃ¤ftsfÃ¼hrer)

Umsatzsteuer Identifikationsnummer (USt-ID): DE344258260

Handelsregister
GefÃ¼hrt bei: Amtsgericht Charlottenburg
Nummer: HRB 230086 B

" }

properties.description: The account id.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The username of the account, not including domain.
properties.name: username
acct

The location of the user's profile page.
properties.name: url

properties.description: The profile's display name.

note
properties.description: The profile's bio or description.

properties.name: avatar
properties.description: An image icon that is shown next to statuses and in the profile.

properties.name: avatar_static
properties.description: A static version of the avatar. Equal to `avatar` if its value is a static image; different if `avatar` is an animated GIF.
An image banner that is shown above the profile and in profile cards.
properties.name: header

properties.description: A static version of the header. Equal to `header` if its value is a static image; different if `header` is an animated GIF.
properties.name: header_static

properties.description: Whether the account manually approves follow requests.
properties.name: locked
fields

properties.name: emojis
properties.description: Custom emoji entities to be used when rendering the profile.

properties.name: bot
properties.description: Indicates that the account may perform automated actions, may not be monitored, or identifies as a robot.
Indicates that the account represents a Group actor.
properties.name: group

properties.description: Whether the account has opted into discovery features such as the profile directory.
properties.name: discoverable

properties.description: Whether the local user has opted out of being indexed by search engines.
properties.name: noindex

properties.description: Indicates that the profile is currently inactive and that its user has moved to a new account.
properties.name: moved

properties.description: An extra attribute returned only when an account is suspended.
properties.name: suspended
limited
properties.description: An extra attribute returned only when an account is silenced. If true, indicates that the account should be hidden behind a warning screen.
When the account was created.
properties.name: created_at
last_status_at
properties.description: When the most recent status was posted.

properties.name: statuses_count
properties.description: How many statuses are attached to this account.
The reported followers of this profile.
properties.name: followers_count

properties.description: The reported follows of this profile.
properties.name: following_count

        "name":"Patreon",
        "value":"\u003ca href=\"https://www.patreon.com/mastodon\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener noreferrer me\"\u003e\u003cspan class=\"invisible\"\u003ehttps://www.\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan class=\"\"\u003epatreon.com/mastodon\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan class=\"invisible\"\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/a\u003e",
        "verified_at":null
      }
    ]
  },
  "rules":[
    {
      "id":"1",
      "text":"Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting"
    },
    {
      "id":"2",
      "text":"No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism"
    },
    {
      "id":"3",
      "text":"No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies"
    },
    {
      "id":"4",
      "text":"No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users"
    },
    {
      "id":"5",
      "text":"No content illegal in Germany"
    },
    {
      "id":"7",
      "text":"Do not share intentionally false or misleading information"
    }
  ]
}

Receive a push notification when a poll you voted in or created has ended?
properties.name: alerts[poll]

properties.description: Receive a push notification when a status you interacted with has been edited?
properties.name: alerts[update]

properties.description: Receive a push notification when a new user has signed up?
properties.name: alerts[admin.sign_up]
alerts[admin.report]
properties.description: Receive a push notification when a new report has been filed?

WebPushSubscription.name: WebPushSubscription
WebPushSubscription.description: Represents a subscription to the push streaming server.

properties.name: shortcode
properties.description: The name of the custom emoji.
A link to the custom emoji.
properties.name: url

properties.description: A link to a static copy of the custom emoji.
properties.name: static_url

properties.description: Whether this Emoji should be visible in the picker or unlisted.

properties.description: Used for sorting custom emoji in the picker.

Admin::Dimension.name: Admin::Dimension
Admin::Dimension.description: Represents qualitative data about the server.

properties.name: key
properties.description: The unique keystring for the requested dimension.

properties.name: data
properties.description: The data available for the requested dimension.

Context.name: Context
Context.description: Represents the tree around a given status. Used for reconstructing threads of statuses.

properties.description: Parents in the thread.
properties.name: ancestors
descendants
properties.description: Children in the thread.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the email block in the database.
The SHA256 hash of the canonical email address.
properties.name: canonical_email_hash

DomainBlock.name: DomainBlock
DomainBlock.description: Represents a domain that is blocked by the instance.

properties.name: domain
properties.description: The domain which is blocked. This may be obfuscated or partially censored.
The SHA256 hash digest of the domain string.
properties.name: digest

properties.description: The level to which the domain is blocked.
properties.name: severity

properties.description: An optional reason for the domain block.
properties.name: comment

MediaAttachment.name: MediaAttachment
MediaAttachment.description: Represents a file or media attachment that can be added to a status.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the attachment in the database.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the attachment.
The location of the original full-size attachment.
properties.name: url
preview_url
properties.description: The location of a scaled-down preview of the attachment.

properties.name: remote_url
properties.description: The location of the full-size original attachment on the remote website.
Metadata returned by Paperclip.
properties.name: meta

properties.description: Alternate text that describes what is in the media attachment, to be used for the visually impaired or when media attachments do not load.
properties.name: description

properties.description: A hash computed by [the BlurHash algorithm](https://github.com/woltapp/blurhash), for generating colorful preview thumbnails when media has not been downloaded yet.
properties.name: blurhash
text_url
properties.description: A shorter URL for the attachment.

Trends::Link.description: Represents a rich preview card that is generated using OpenGraph tags from a URL.
Trends::Link.name: Trends::Link

properties.description: Usage statistics for given days (typically the past week).
properties.name: history
history[][day]
properties.description: UNIX timestamp on midnight of the given day.
The counted accounts using the link within that day.
properties.name: history[][accounts]
history[][uses]
properties.description: The counted statuses using the link within that day.

V1::Filter.name: V1::Filter
V1::Filter.description: Represents a user-defined filter for determining which statuses should not be shown to the user. Contains a single keyword or phrase.

properties.description: The ID of the filter in the database.
properties.name: id

properties.description: The text to be filtered.
properties.name: phrase

properties.description: The contexts in which the filter should be applied.
properties.name: context

properties.description: When the filter should no longer be applied.
properties.name: expires_at
irreversible
properties.description: Should matching entities in home and notifications be dropped by the server? See [implementation guidelines for filters]({{< relref "api/guidelines#filters" >}}).

properties.name: whole_word
properties.description: Should the filter consider word boundaries? See [implementation guidelines for filters]({{< relref "api/guidelines#filters" >}}).
The ID of the DomainBlock in the database.
properties.name: id
domain
properties.description: The domain that is not allowed to federate.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: When the domain was blocked from federating.

properties.name: severity
properties.description: The policy to be applied by this domain block.

properties.name: reject_media
properties.description: Whether to reject media attachments from this domain
Whether to reject reports from this domain
properties.name: reject_reports
obfuscate
properties.description: Whether to obfuscate public displays of this domain block

Admin::DomainBlock.description: Represents a domain limited from federating.
Admin::DomainBlock.name: Admin::DomainBlock

properties.description: The value of the hashtag after the # sign.
properties.name: name

properties.description: A link to the hashtag on the instance.
properties.name: url

properties.description: Usage statistics for given days (typically the past week).
properties.name: history

properties.description: UNIX timestamp on midnight of the given day.
properties.name: history[][day]
history[][uses]
properties.description: The counted usage of the tag within that day.

properties.name: history[][accounts]
properties.description: The total of accounts using the tag within that day.

properties.name: following
properties.description: Whether the current token's authorized user is following this tag.

Tag.name: Tag
Tag.description: Represents a hashtag used within the content of a status.

{
  "url": "https://www.theguardian.com/money/2019/dec/07/i-lost-my-193000-inheritance-with-one-wrong-digit-on-my-sort-code",
  "title": "â€˜I lost my Â£193,000 inheritance â€“ with one wrong digit on my sort codeâ€™",

  "author_name": "",

  "provider_name": "",

properties.name: url
properties.description: Location of linked resource.
Title of linked resource.
properties.name: title

properties.description: Description of preview.
properties.name: description
type
properties.description: The type of the preview card.
The author of the original resource.
properties.name: author_name

properties.description: A link to the author of the original resource.
properties.name: author_url
provider_name
properties.description: The provider of the original resource.
A link to the provider of the original resource.

properties.description: HTML to be used for generating the preview card.
properties.name: html
width
properties.description: Width of preview, in pixels.
Height of preview, in pixels.
properties.name: height

properties.description: Preview thumbnail.
properties.name: image

properties.description: Used for photo embeds, instead of custom `html`.
properties.name: embed_url

properties.description: A hash computed by [the BlurHash algorithm](https://github.com/woltapp/blurhash), for generating colorful preview thumbnails when media has not been downloaded yet.
properties.name: blurhash

Field.name: Field

properties.description: The URL of an attached Status.
properties.name: url
filter
properties.description: The filter that was matched.
The keyword within the filter that was matched.

FilterResult.name: FilterResult

Notification.description: Represents a notification of an event relevant to the user.
Notification.name: Notification

properties.name: id
properties.description: The id of the notification in the database.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of event that resulted in the notification.
The timestamp of the notification.
properties.name: created_at

properties.description: The account that performed the action that generated the notification.
properties.name: account

properties.description: Status that was the object of the notification. Attached when `type` of the notification is `favourite`, `reblog`, `status`, `mention`, `poll`, or `update`.
properties.name: status

properties.description: Report that was the object of the notification. Attached when `type` of the notification is `admin.report`.
properties.name: report

Role.name: Role
Role.description: Represents a custom user role that grants permissions.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the Role in the database.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the role.
The hex code assigned to this role. If no hex code is assigned, the string will be empty.
properties.name: color

properties.description: A bitmask that represents the sum of all permissions granted to the role.
properties.name: permissions
highlighted
properties.description: Whether the role is publicly visible as a badge on user profiles.

The counted accounts signup attempts using that email domain within that day.
